title: Competency-Based Real-World Problem-Solving Curriculum for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized constructivist approaches to strengthen adult learners' self-directed learning abilities, emphasizing problem-solving activities based on real-world nursing scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze non-routine problems occurring in real nursing environments and propose solutions
Learners can integrate and apply nursing competency-based knowledge through self-directed learning
Learners can revise and supplement personalized learning strategies by reflecting on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
